author: Struan Robertson
comment: As with Arun' s experience (2.1.2018) the purchased version reverted to the free version - especially annoying as it was obtained for using xl version of excel. Lot of work lost here! Very disappointing. Have no screen shots to offer - cannot resurrect what has disappeared! Shall contact you separately for another download via Google play store. Look forward to your immediate response.

author: Donald Tierney
comment: Caveat emptor! Paid the full $14.99 to these rip-off artists and they refused to give me an activation code for my new phone. Program was only ever on my old phone. Tried to tell me I exceeded the activation requests. Bullcrap. They don't even answer emails anymore.

author: Joe Lato
comment: This app is disfunctional. It stops working correctly. You try and update to correct it's problems, then I wants you to purchase the app again... Very frustrated..

author: Arun Venkatakrishnan
comment: Premium app became free with ads automatically. What happened team? No intimations. Make it back to premium version.  Dear team,   What happened to my purchased pro version? It came along with my phone. I am using only one Gmail account to login.   Thanks, Arun.

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello Arun,

We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing a problem with OfficeSuite. 

Please contact us at: support@mobisystems.com providing more details and screenshots, if applicable, so that we can help.

We take pride in our products and are constantly working to improve and make them better.

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

author: karen orlanski
comment: I installed as a trial for the pro version, as it says clearly, to decide whether to buy it or not. But it's full of adds and it's so annoying! I need to know if the pro (payed) version is add free, if so I'll buy it. Thanks

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello Karen,

OfficeSuite Pro does not have ads. In fact, there will be a holiday sale of the program on Dec. 24 and 25th and then again on Dec. 31 and Jan. 1st. Check out the Google play store for the promotion.

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

author: Bmw Contracting
comment: Bought this over 5 years ago. Whenever I get a new phone, it was not recognized that I paid. The 1st time they took care of it. This time they wanted to see the email proof of purchase or something. NO, I DO NOT KEEP MY GMAIL FOR 5 YEARS! so I was managing with WPS instead. Crooks.  Edit : after the reply below about the account... I ONLY used 1 Google account. This is the account I purchased it with. The last time I switched phones, they reactivated it. This time they won't.

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello,

You are reviewing the OfficeSuite Pro Trial app. If you have purchased the Pro version, you need to be logged in with the account which made the purchase for the system to recognize it.

Contact us at: support@mobisystems.com for additional assistance.

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

author: shukoor yaar
comment: This app is stupid AF! Can't copy text or save the file you been working on it can't share nothing been waste of time Uninstalling!

author: Sam P
comment: As of now it looks OK. Will have to wait as I work through for more review.  Can somebody tell me how to insert a 'line-break' in a word document.

author: Sagar Kulkarni
comment: I like the text to speech options most.  I read lot of books by this app.  Its very useful for students. Need some update in text to speech option. For butter understanding. Overall Very Nice App.  Thank You

author: Sue Caddis
comment: This app is perfect for my needs as I can open and write Word documents and am looking forward to trying out the other tools available.

reply.author: MobiSystems
reply.content:
Hello Sue,

Thank you for the great rating!

There currently is a sale of OfficeSuite Pro for Cyber Week - please check Google Play and you can obtain the application at a greatly discounted price.

Thank you!
-MobiSystems

comment: Not a great program. Just doesn't get the job done. Also, to much advertising.
When I try to open a pdf attached to mail, the app stops (crashes) after opening the pdf. And it's happening again and again.

author: Ng Chinsoo
comment: Cannot even open in .xlsx file format correctly! Too many ads even for a 7 days trial version!
